title: My Top 20 Lessons from Building 100s of AI Agents (Super Actionable)
description:
I've built hundreds of AI agents over the past couple of years and learned MANY lessons through doing so - a lot of them the hard way. I put a ton of effort into condensing all of these lessons in the top 20 for you so that you can learn from my grind and my mistakes. The goal here is to save you dozens if not hundreds of hours learning them all yourself like I had to do!

This content is from one of the special Dynamous Launch Week events and is super value packed and actionable. I'm releasing this on my YouTube channel in celebration of the Archon Beta launch and reaching 1,000 members this weekend in the Dynamous community!

I hope you get a lot out of this and let me know in the comments if you want me to make a full video on any of the lessons or tips I cover here!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- If you're looking for an AI coding assistant that's fast, feature rich, and can handle complex coding problems, check out Windsurf:
https://wind.surf/colemedin

- If you're looking to join a community for early AI adopters to master AI Coding & AI Agents and transform your career or business, check out Dynamous:
https://dynamous.ai

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Introducing my Top 20 Agent Lessons
00:43 - Gameplan for the Event
02:11 - Clearly Defining an AI Agent
05:28 - The Biggest Challenging Developing AI Agents
08:17 - Tip #1: Use Agents to Save Time, not Replace You
10:44 - Tip #2: Don't Skimp on Planning & Prototyping
12:00 - Tip #3: Beware the Hallucination Blow Up
14:27 - Windsurf (Agentic Coding Assistant)
15:56 - Tip #4: Reduce Hallucinations with Agent Guardrails
19:22 - Tip #5: Reduce Hallucinations with Specialized Agents
21:20 - Tip #6: Reduce Hallucinations with EXAMPLES
23:12 - Tip #7: Avoid Negatives in System Prompts
25:21 - Tip #8: Avoid Contradictions in System Prompts
28:41 - Tip #9: Version Your System Prompts!
30:08 - Tip #10: Swapping LLMs can be Dangerous
32:11 - Tip #11: Your Favorite LLM isn't Always the Best
33:32 - Tip #12: LLMs - Watch Your Context Lengths
35:28 - Tip #13: Previous Hallucinations Likely Repeat
37:29 - Tip #14: Long Term Memory is Just Another RAG
39:06 - Tip #15: Include Tool Calls in Conversation History
41:06 - Tip #16: Tool Descriptions are KEY
42:51 - Tip #17: Give Examples for Complex Tools
43:35 - Tip #18: Always Catch & Return Tool Errors
45:10 - Tip #19: Tools - Only Return what the LLM Needs to Know
46:39 - Tip #20: The Anatomy of a Good Tool
49:18 - Dynamous Community Q&A

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least once a week - Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
